tasks.label: Final validation to confirm README accuracy
Create Virtual Environment
tasks.command: python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip

tasks.label: Detect Graphics Hardware
tasks.command: lspci | grep -i vga && echo '=== AMD/ATI cards ===' && lspci | grep -i amd && echo '=== ROCm info ===' && rocm-smi || echo 'ROCm not available' && echo '=== HIP runtime ===' && hipconfig || echo 'HIP not available'

tasks.label: Replace MONAI loader file and run verification
tasks.command: mv src/data/loaders_monai_fixed.py src/data/loaders_monai.py && source venv/bin/activate && python verify_monai_checklist.py

tasks.label: Test MONAI import
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && source venv/bin/activate && python -c "from monai.data import load_decathlon_datalist; print('Import successful')"

tasks.label: Check function alias
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && source venv/bin/activate && python -c "from src.data.loaders_monai import load_monai_decathlon; print(type(load_monai_decathlon)); print(load_monai_decathlon.__name__)"

tasks.label: Check function alias resolution in fresh shell
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); from src.data.loaders_monai import load_monai_decathlon; print(f'Function: {load_monai_decathlon.__name__}'); print(f'Module: {load_monai_decathlon.__module__}'); import inspect; print(f'File: {inspect.getfile(load_monai_decathlon)}')"

tasks.label: Clean Python cache files
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && find . -name "__pycache__" -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name "*.pyc" -delete 2>/dev/null || true

tasks.label: Run complete verification with corrected alias
Final verification with all tests passing
Test transform presets are still working
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/unit/test_transforms_presets.py -v

tasks.label: Run unit tests for transform presets
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/unit/test_transforms_presets.py -v

tasks.label: Test Training with Overlays (Activated)

tasks.label: Test Training with Overlays Final

tasks.label: Merge Log Directories
tasks.command: if [ -d 'log' ] && [ -d 'logs' ]; then echo 'Merging log directories...'; mkdir -p logs; if [ "$(ls -A log 2>/dev/null)" ]; then cp -r log/* logs/ 2>/dev/null || true; fi; rmdir log 2>/dev/null || rm -rf log; echo 'Log merge complete'; else echo 'No duplicate log directories found'; fi

tasks.label: Update smoke train task status
tasks.command: python3 scripts/organization/task_manager.py set-status final_validation run_smoke_train --status completed

tasks.label: Update smoke train task status (correct syntax)
tasks.command: python3 scripts/organization/task_manager.py set-status final_validation completed --task-id run_smoke_train

tasks.label: Mark all organization tasks as completed
Check Docker validation script
tasks.command: echo 'Starting Copilot Tasks execution...' && echo '1. Environment & Container Verification' && ls -la scripts/validation/test_docker.sh

tasks.label: Install ML Dependencies
tasks.command: echo 'Installing MONAI and MLflow...' && pip install monai mlflow torch torchvision

tasks.label: Install ML Dependencies in venv
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && pip install monai mlflow torch torchvision && python3 -c 'import monai, mlflow; print(f"MONAI: {monai.__version__}, MLflow: {mlflow.__version__}")'

tasks.label: Check GPU/CUDA Availability
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && python -c "import torch; print(f'PyTorch version: {torch.__version__}'); print(f'CUDA available: {torch.cuda.is_available()}'); print(f'CUDA devices: {torch.cuda.device_count()}')"

tasks.label: Download Brain Dataset (Training Only)

tasks.label: Check Downloaded Dataset

tasks.label: Check Training Process
tasks.command: ps aux | grep train_enhanced | grep -v grep

tasks.label: 1-Epoch Smoke Test
tasks.command: cd /home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation && source .venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=/home/kevin/Projects/tumor-detection-segmentation python src/training/train_enhanced.py --config config/recipes/test_overlay.json --dataset-config config/datasets/msd_task01_brain.json --epochs 1 --save-overlays --overlays-max 2 --save-prob-maps --val-max-batches 2

tasks.label: Check Running Training Processes
tasks.command: echo 'ðŸ” Checking for active training processes...' && ps aux | grep -E '(train_enhanced|python.*train)' | grep -v grep || echo 'No training processes found' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“ Checking for recent log files...' && find logs/ -name '*.log' -mmin -60 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo 'No recent log files found' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“Š Checking MLflow runs...' && ls -la mlruns/ 2>/dev/null | tail -5 || echo 'No MLflow runs directory found'

tasks.label: Check Recent Training Activity
tasks.command: echo 'ðŸ” Checking recent activity and status...' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“Š Recent files in project:' && find . -type f -mmin -120 -name '*.py' -o -name '*.log' -o -name '*.json' | grep -E '(train|log|mlruns)' | head -10 && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“ Contents of logs directory:' && ls -la logs/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No logs directory' && echo '' && echo 'ðŸ“ˆ Checking for any recent training outputs:' && find . -name 'mlruns' -type d 2>/dev/null && find . -name '*.pth' -o -name 'checkpoints' -type d 2>/dev/null | head -5

tasks.label: Test Training Launcher
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && echo 'ðŸš€ Testing training launcher configuration...' && python test_training_launcher.py

tasks.label: Launch Expanded Training Sequence
tasks.command: source .venv/bin/activate && echo 'ðŸš€ Launching Expanded Training Sequence...' && echo 'Current time:' $(date) && python launch_expanded_training.py

tasks.label: Monitor Active Training
tasks.command: echo 'ðŸ” Monitoring training process...' && echo 'Checking for active training processes:' && ps aux | grep -E '(train_enhanced|python.*train)' | grep -v grep && echo '' && echo 'Recent files (last 5 minutes):' && find . -type f -mmin -5 | grep -E '(log|mlruns|checkpoints)' | head -10 && echo '' && echo 'Checking system resources:' && echo 'Memory usage:' && free -h | head -2 && echo 'CPU load:' && uptime

tasks.label: Check Training Outputs
tasks.command: echo 'ðŸ“ˆ Checking for training outputs and logs...' && echo '' && echo 'MLflow runs directory:' && ls -la mlruns/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No mlruns directory yet' && echo '' && echo 'Models/checkpoints directory:' && ls -la models/checkpoints/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No checkpoints yet' && echo '' && echo 'Any new log files:' && find . -name '*.log' -mmin -10 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo 'No new log files' && echo '' && echo 'Checking for any .out files:' && find . -name '*.out' -mmin -10 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo 'No .out files'

tasks.label: Check Training Progress
tasks.command: sleep 30 && echo 'ðŸ”„ Checking training progress after 30 seconds...' && echo 'Training processes:' && ps aux | grep train_enhanced | grep -v grep && echo '' && echo 'Checking for any new directories/files:' && find . -maxdepth 2 -type d -mmin -5 2>/dev/null | grep -E '(mlruns|logs|outputs)' && find . -maxdepth 3 -name '*.log' -o -name '*.out' -mmin -5 2>/dev/null | head -5

tasks.label: Monitor Training Progress
tasks.command: echo 'ðŸ“‹ Training Status Update:' && date && echo '' && echo 'Active processes:' && ps aux | grep train_enhanced | grep -v grep && echo '' && echo 'Checking for any new outputs:' && find . -type d -name 'mlruns' -o -name 'cache' -o -name 'logs' | head -5 && echo '' && echo 'Memory usage update:' && free -h | grep Mem && echo '' && echo 'Waiting for more progress...'

tasks.label: Detailed Training Monitor
tasks.command: echo 'ðŸ“‹ Detailed Training Monitoring...' && echo 'Time: '$(date) && echo '' && echo 'Process details:' && ps aux | grep train_enhanced | grep -v grep | head -2 && echo '' && echo 'Checking for MONAI cache:' && find . -path '*cache*' -type d 2>/dev/null | head -5 && echo '' && echo 'Data directory status:' && ls -la data/msd/ | head -5 && echo '' && echo 'Checking for any outputs in models:' && find models/ -type f -mmin -10 2>/dev/null | head -3
